function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Global pandemic affecting sustainable development goals","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of hospital reforms on inequalities in health and food systems","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unachieved sustainable development goals","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Facial recognition technology used to track individuals infected with covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bio-surveillance facial recognition system monitoring social distancing and mask-wearing adherence","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct contact between patients and healthcare workers","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on robotic systems","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of facial recognition technology to identify potential covid-19 cases.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact during temperature screening process","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of workers and patients to germ-eliminating devices in hospitals","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation of uvc doses in intensity and exposure time","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to uv radiation from artificial and natural sources","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission devices","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to uva, uvb, and uvc rays","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of strong healthcare prevention","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene practices in public spaces","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited lifestyles","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of disclosure of competing interests","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased public
